channel.title: Need 317 help!
channel.description:
well i have only just started coding and am finding it realy interesting, but im realy stuck on a couple of things
1. once my charector died there hp goes down to 0 and i cant move from my position, this is getting very annoying. so please if you can help please reply.
2. i cant seem to code commands into my server, i have a few already but just not the vital :: pickup.
any replys would be most appreciated ..... =D
thanks ...
korey

item.title: Need 317 help!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Adding commands is really easy, take a look at other commands and do an exact copy under one with a different command name and actions

well…
when my player dies he i teleported to wherever he goes and when i try to walk he wont. this isnt a prob with walking it when you respawn after death and the hp dont reset to like 10/10 it stays at 0/10 ???

can you help?
